hero_section.title: Timber Marketing & Procurement Specialists
hero_section.paragraph: Since 1936, S.A. Allen Timber has helped landowners take their forest products to market.

services_section.title: SERVICES
services_section.paragraph: S. A. Allen’s extensive network of logging contractors specialize in all classes of timber, which allows us to offer our landowners a sizeable catalog of harvesting services including total tree harvest (clear-cut), first thinning, second thinning, and land development harvests.

services.title: Turning Timber into Money
services.paragraph: Have standing timber? Let us convert your asset into cash.

services.title: General Contractor for Timber
services.paragraph: To cut or not to cut? Let us help you maximize the value of your timber through our contractor network and marketing expertise.

processes.title: Site Visit
processes.paragraph: Contact us and we’ll make a site-visit to assess the potential of your timber.

processes.title: Evaluate
processes.paragraph: From the site visit, we determine which product types will need to be merchandised to maximize financial returns.

processes.title: Find Buyers
processes.paragraph: We approach multiple mill customers and allow them to evaluate the timber for their needs, after which they’re able to make an offer, if they so choose.

processes.title: Price
processes.paragraph: We formulate a stumpage price for the landowner from the mill bid including logging, hauling and brokering.

processes.title: Contract
processes.paragraph: A verbal agreement is reached and we move to the contract phase, which includes multiple payment options for the landowner.

processes.title: Harvest
processes.paragraph: Harvest Harvesting begins and we act as the intermediary between the landowner, logger, and mills.

about_section.title: About
about_section.paragraph: Over the years S. A. Allen has grown, but some things never change, like our appreciation for family values, focus on landowner objectives, and commitment to harvesting in a profitable, safe, ethical, and environmentally conscious manner.
